mapper.select: SELECT id,library_card_number,name FROM user WHERE library_card_number LIKE '%${key}%' OR name LIKE '%${key}%' ORDER BY id

SELECT space.name,user.name,br.date,br.begin_time,br.end_time,br.permission_status, br.is_active,br.has_check_in,br.booking_time FROM booking_record_history as br INNER JOIN space on br.space_id = space.id INNER JOIN user ON br.user_id = user.id WHERE user_id = #{0} AND br.booking_time > SUBDATE(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 month) ORDER BY booking_time
